com.grademaster.auth
Class Hasher

java.lang.Object
  com.grademaster.auth.Hasher

public class Hasher
extends java.lang.Object

The hasher provides methods to hash strings using SHA-256 (E.g. a password)

Author:
jake

Method Detail

digest

public java.lang.String digest()
                        throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
Digests and returns original string bypassing all caching. I honestly have no idea what most of this method does.

Returns:
a String of the original given String hashed with SHA-256
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - this should never be thrown because I use a static String, but I was too lazy to write a try/catch

getHashed

public java.lang.String getHashed()
Returns the hashed version of the original string. This uses a cache and only digests the message once.

Returns:
a SHA-256 hashed version of the original string
